name: Mountain Carvers Society
description:
You love to ski! In fact you've planned a ski trip every month until the season ends, so let's go carve up the mountain!

Feedback appreciated!

Controls:

  • Ski Left/Right - Left Thumbstick or A/D
  • Ski Faster/Slower - Left Thumbstick or W/S
  • Jump - Xbox A button or Spacebar
  • Exit - Xbox Back button or Escape
